lyric:
[00:13.24]I wanna see your animal side
[00:17.29]Let it all out
[00:20.29]I wanna see the dirt

[00:24.22]I need your broken promises
[00:27.28]
[00:29.34]I want the guts and glory baby
[00:32.99]
[00:36.68]This town is wasted and alone
[00:40.55]
[00:42.36]But we are alive
[00:44.91]Here in death valley
[00:46.97]But don't take love off the table yet
[00:49.74]Cause tonight
[00:51.74]It's just fire alarms and losing you
[00:55.79]
[00:57.60]We love a lot
[00:58.62]
[00:59.57]So we only lose a little
[01:03.12]

[01:06.09]
